entry.content: Image: Capcom The best of the best, on every major platform Games are weird again! Don‚Äôt get us wrong, 2023 was an all-timer. We got new Zelda and Mario. entry.content: Image: Team Cherry Composer Christopher Larkin on the soundtrack‚Äôs melancholic feel In Hollow Knight, you explore a world gone to ruin, where structures are left to rot and plants and fungus reclaim what‚Äôs left. We‚Äôre so glad you asked One of the coolest things about working at Polygon is recommending new, exciting games to play, whether it‚Äôs indie games, cozy games, board games, or just the best of the year. We‚Äôre always playing a huge variety of games ‚Äî it‚Äôs part of the job! ‚Äî so we‚Äôre able to keep you up to date on what‚Äôs what. Lists are an easy way to recommend a whole bunch of games at once, but it‚Äôs also fun to get into personal recom...

entry.content: Graphic: Michael McWhertor/Polygon; Source images: Getty Images Before Rock Band, there were rock bands We used to be a society that made video games starring rock bands and rap collectives in all sorts of genres. We used to have Kiss first-person shooters, Def Jam fighting games, and 50 Cent: Blood on the Sand. Polygon FM, a week of stories about all the places where music and games connect -- retrospectives, interviews, and much more. Today, the sub-genre of musician-led games barely e...
